story.title: My Story
paragraphs: My name is Anastasia Zhazhko. I am a fitness coach and gym trainer with many years of experience. Fitness is not only my job — it is an important part of my life. I am a prize-winner and champion in bodybuilding competitions, and this experience helps me understand how the body works and what it needs to grow.

The main focus of my training is improving health, strengthening the body, and increasing the quality of life. I teach people to train safely, effectively, and with enjoyment. I help build proper nutrition, create healthy habits, and most importantly — learn to love their bodies.
My goal is to make sport not just a temporary hobby, but a source of strength, energy, and confidence every day.

items.question: What if I’m a beginner?
items.answer: No worries! All programs are adapted to your current level — whether you’re just starting or already experienced.

items.question: Can I combine training and nutrition programs?
items.answer: Absolutely! Combining both can lead to even better results and a more holistic approach to your health and fitness.

items.question: How is the nutrition plan created?
items.answer: The nutrition plan is personalized based on your goals, preferences, and any dietary restrictions you may have.

items.question: Do I need any equipment for online training?
items.answer: Most exercises can be done with minimal equipment, but having basic items like dumbbells or resistance bands can enhance your workouts.

items.question: How soon will I see results?
items.answer: Results vary depending on individual effort and consistency, but many clients start noticing changes within a few weeks.
